subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Alexander Vinokourov may be out of the competition for the overall Tour de France victory.  But that has not stopped the determined Astana team leader from riding his best on a stage-by-stage basis.
snippet: Alexander Vinokourov may be out of the competition for the overall Tour de France victory.  But that has not stopped the determined Astana team leader from riding his best on a stage-by-stage basis.
